topic.title: Installing using yum
topic.shortdesc: This installation uses a package management system.

body.p: To install on RHEL/CentOS version 6 or 7 using yum:

ol.li: Download and install the appropriate meta package from the location packages.couchbase.com. This will install the package source and the Couchbase public keys:curl -O http://packages.couchbase.com/releases/couchbase-release/couchbase-release-1.0.0-x86_64.rpm sudo rpm -i couchbase-release-1.0.0.noarch.rpm
Proceed with installing the actual Couchbase Server package: sudo yum update sudo yum install couchbase-server OR sudo yum install couchbase-server-community
